page.title: 07WOODCHURCH SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: Leo's Superstore is situated in {Woodchurch,}Wirral. A shopping survey was conducted there and these were the results of it. A total number of 87 people were interviewed. Of these, 24 came from Woodchurch, and the majority of the other shoppers came from the surrounding areas. Most people shopped there once a week. Friday was the most popular day. Over 50% of the people shopped there on that day. The next most popular day was Thursday. The reasons why people shopped there were many and varied. The most popular reasons were for convenience, variety and good value.
